name: One more round
description:
One More Round is a turn based shooter game with randomly generated levels. You have 5 seconds to move and 5 seconds to shoot.

The goal is to kill all the enemies and pass as many rounds as possible. Every round consists of 3 waves of enemies.

There are 3 types of enemies in this game:

There are 3 enemy types in this game
  1.  Melee Enemy - needs to get close to the player to deal damage
  2.  Kamikaze - when he gets close to the player he will explode within 3 seconds
  3.  Long Range - has an assault rifle and shoots bullets that can be destroyed

With every round you pass the new map will be generated. Maps can have different theme, which for now only affect the aesthetic of the game.

The themes are:

  1.  Alien
  2.  Grassland
  3.  Icy

This game is made as a solo project in 3 weeks for "Indie Game Making Contest 2018" game jam.

All suggestions, bug reports etc. are welcome!
